questions.question: Which OAuth providers should be supported?
questions.answer: Google and GitHub initially, with extensible architecture for more
questions.rationale: These are the most commonly requested enterprise providers

questions.question: Where should OAuth tokens be stored?
questions.answer: Encrypted in database with per-user encryption keys
questions.rationale: Provides security while allowing token refresh

questions.question: What should be the token expiration time?
questions.answer: Access tokens: 1 hour, Refresh tokens: 30 days
questions.rationale: Balance between security and user convenience
